Text: RE Morning Meetings Cc FYI The Oasis point has been corrected to match what the imbalance should be Contract numbers were switched around and should be fixed for tomorrows morning meeting The cumulative imbalance for Valero Sprayberry is right around dths The other points on the sheet have also been updated with the correct contract numbers Thanks Scott Original Message From Forbish Sherry Sent Wednesday January AM To Vaughan Cara Greaney Chris Scurlock Debra Woodson Harry McDaniel Janet Adams Jean Linhart Joe Sturr Kathy Janzen Randy Benningfield Robert Hibbard Scott Forbish Sherry Cc Buchanan John Kowalke Terry Schoolcraft Darrell Spraggins Gary Subject Morning Meetings Terry stopped by to ask that all of us look at the Gas Plan the portion listing our points the monthly imbalance and the cumulative imbalance Probably this is Scott mostly Scott has the Oasis EPNG Lone Star group Valero interconnects Cara has PEPL Robert has KN Pony Express and Chris has Halley In any event please take a look at this summary page of the Gas Plan We need to be aware DAILY if these numbers that are coming across are fairly correct are we in the ballpark etc The example we can look at is Oasis we dont see how we could be short cumulative at Oasis yet thats the number that is being reflected Scott is already tackling this one Terry said we need to get in touch with Dale Ratliff to get the numbers corrected And we need to do this today This is a high profile item that Dynegy will be looking at Terry has asked that we make sure Gary is always kept informed as well as the people who generally go to the meeting thanks
Weekend Notes thru Cc Thanks Scott
